# subscript(dynamicMember:)

**Instance Subscript**

Access the value of the attribute to constrain.

## Declaration

```swift
subscript(dynamicMember keyPath: KeyPath<Subscope, Attribute>) -> Attribute.Value? { get set }
```

## Overview

For details on how attribute value constraining works, refer to [doc://com.apple.SwiftUI/documentation/SwiftUI/AttributedTextValueConstraint/constrain(_:)].
